title: ADC Kennen and will it work ?
body:
Kennen have a really high base attack speed and a nice attack speed growth with some self peel from his passive. He also have some nice AD scaling on his W on every 5th basic attack. Im thinking of building Kennen like a kalista where you go {{item:3085}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3035}} {{item:3139}}. So will this work ?

With this build +  AS from runes and masteries (18.5% from runes and masteries) kennen will have around 211.3% attack speed at level 18. The math for the attack speed:

kennen base AS = 0.69
Total AS from runes and masteries (%AS) = 153.5%
Kennen (%) AS at lvl 18 = 57.8% (3.4% per lvl) 

Kennen AS at lvl 18 with full build and AS from runes and masteries 
= ((153.5 + 57.8)/100)+ 1)*(0.69)
=3.113*0.69
=2.14797

>
> I don't think diving in straight up is the best idea for an adc

Dun worry i am not someone who R into the whole enemy team as kennen without a zhonya's hourglass which i might never get as an ADC although Zhonya doesn't sound bad as a defensive item if i need it.
Sorry m8 ad kennen is already a thing, it's played just about as much as ap kennen.
